resources.string:
The word queue is the only word in
the English language that is still pronounced
the same way when the last four letters are
removed.

Beetles taste like apples, wasps like pine
nuts, and worms like fried bacon.

Of all the words in the English language,
the word 'set' has the most definitions!

Months that begin on a Sunday will always
have a "Friday the 13th."

Coca-Cola would be green if colouring
werenâ€™t added to it.

On average a hedgehog's heart beats 300
times a minute.
